author: Ribose#1243
name: Falcogs
description: Useful utilities I created for the Falcom discord, generalized for any Red V3 bots.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! These are useful utilities I made, and I hope there's something for you, too. Submit issues to <https://github.com/nmbook/FalcomBot-cogs/issues>, message me privately on discord at **Ribose#1243**, or ping me on the Red Cog Support server <https://discord.gg/GET4DVk>.
